As an institution in the Banking sector, the Bank is compliant with the Labour laws of

India, that stipulate minimum wages for employees falling under different categories. 
 
The Bank's remuneration of employees is in alignment with Section 197 read with Rule 
5 (1) of the Companies (Appointment and Remuneration of 
Managerial Personnel) Rules, 2014, as amended, in respect of Directors / Employees of 
the Bank.
